app.lem: Sebastian Ilsungs Wallfart nach S. Iago und an andere h. Orte in Spanien, im Jahr 1446
app.rdg: Sebastian Ilsung’s pilgrimage to Santiago and other holy places in Spain, in the year 1446

app.lem:
TEXT GOES HEREGLOSS GOES HERE
CRITICAL NOTE GOES HERE
app.rdg: Here is to register and to know about the great journey to the Lord of Saint Jacob, and to the dark star Hier braucht es definitiv eine Fußnote, denn Sebastian von Ilsung hat einen „Verständnisfehler“ in einen Schreibfehler umgewandelt = Finisterre and about the countries I, Sebastian Ilsung, crossed, all at my own cost and expenditure. And with me a mounted envoy, afoot a servant from the duke of Savoy, my gracious lord. He commanded, that hieraus he had to ride with me, as it also happened. What honor and courtesy I experienced, And what hereafter stands written or is painted, that happened, truthfully, with the help of the almighty God and his beloved mother and the dear lord Saint Jacob. And I accomplished the journey within half a year, in the year that is counted as 1446.
